name: 互動式英語閱讀
comment: 進階英語課程，供非英語系同學選修
description: 訓練學生利用閱讀策略，經由閱讀過程中的討論，提昇學生英語閱讀能力，也藉由問答方式讓學生與文本、老師、及同學間產生互動，以深入探討文章內涵。
goals: 強化學生英語文聆聽、閱讀、口語、寫作的表達能力，協助獲取新知。
提昇學生英語文進階溝通能力及文學素養。
syllabus:
**Class Time:**        Thursdays, 10:20 a.m. - 12:10 p.m.

**Classroom:**        勤 301      

**Instructor:**         Dr. PiYu Chiang

**Office:**                CHENG 709        

**Email:**                 piyu.chiang.ntnu@gmail.com

**Office Hours:**    By appointment

**I. COURSE OVERVIEW**

The main purpose of this course is to expand students’ abilities to read, reflect and then discuss various cultural and global topics. No textbook is required. All reading materials will come from reliable sources such as The New York Times. Students are expected to read prior to the class and participate in class discussions.

**II. GRADING**

          Attendance 20%

*   If you have to miss a class, please email me in advance.
*   If you miss the class for more than 3 times (unexcused), points will be deducted.

          In-Class Participation 40%

*   Finish reading before class; contribute your opinions in class.

          Assignments (group and individual activities) 30%

          Presentation 10%

*   Present a mind map or an infograph to illustrate what you have learned from this course.
